element.name: Thunderous Trident
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Its damage and base properties are that of a mundane trident.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

This weapon has 3 charges, and regains 1d4-1 (minimum of 1) charges at dawn. When you throw this weapon at a creature or surface and successfully hit, you can spend a charge as a bonus action to cast thunderstep next to the trident. Your spellcasting ability for thunderstep, when cast through the trident, is Charisma.

element.name: The Backstabber
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. Its base properties are that of a mundane dagger, but its base damage is 1d6 piercing.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

You have advantage on attack rolls made with this weapon against a creature that you're behind of. When you attack a creature from behind with this dagger and hit, you deal increase the dagger's damage by 1d6 piecring damage and the attack is a critical hit. You can also make an extra attack when you take the attack action using this weapon.

element.name: Goredrinker
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Its base properties are that of a mundane longsword.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.
When you successfully hit a creature with this weapon, you apply a stack bleeding wound. For each stack applied to a creature, they lose 1d6 Hit Points, for up to a maximum of 4 stacks per creature.

element.name: Obsidian Basher
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Its base properties are that of a mundane warhammer.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

You can cause structural harm to a creature you are in combar with unhindered. Once per long rest when attacking with this weapon, you can make a called shot against a target creature's arm, leg or torso, hindering their effectiveness in combat. When you make this called shot, you don't gain disadvantage on the attack, but your target must fail a DC 15 Strength saving throw to suffer the effects. Succesfully hitting an arm of the creature imposes disadvantage on weapon attacks they make using their hands, hitting a leg halves their movement, and hitting their torso damages vital organs, imposing disadvantage on Constitution saving throws.

element.name: Recalling Dagger
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: This dagger's damage is 1d6 piercing, and is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

Once per turn, after missing with a ranged weapon attack made with this dagger, it teleports back to you, and you can remake the attack. On a hit, the dagger teleport back to you only if you wish it to.

element.name: Spectral Bow
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this bow.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

You can shoot at and hit creatures with spectral arrows, if the creatures are within the normal range of this weapon that are behind any type of cover without penalties imposed by cover, unless the cover is thicker than 5 feet.

element.name: Spellsword
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: You gain a +1 bonus spell attack rolls, and attack and damage rolls made with this sword.

Casting a spell as a bonus action on your turn, and then making an attack as your action on the same turn, or casting a spell as an action that requires you to immediately make a melee attack, increases the damage of the attack made with this sword by 1d4 force damage. Casting a spell as that doesn't require you to immediately make a melee attack an action increases the damage of the next successful attack you make with this weapon by 1d8 force damage.

The sword has 3 charges. After killing a creature with this sword, you can spend any number of available charges and regain a spell slot with a level equal to the number of charges spent. You regain all charges after a long rest.

element.name: Onyx Blaster Cannon
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: This matte black two-handed man-portable cannon holds a fist-sized onyx stone. It seems to be from a civilization long lost.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

This weapon deals 1d10 force damage on a hit. When attacking with this weapon, you can choose to take 1d4 necrotic damage to empower the shot with extra energy. If you do so, on a hit you deal an extra 1d6 necrotic damage.

element.name: Onyx Saber
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: This matte black hilted longsword holds an onyx stone in its crossguard. It seems to be from a civilization long lost.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can choose to decrease your maximum number of Hit Points by 10 for 1 hour. While your Hit Points a decreased this way, every time an enemy dies within 30 feet of you that you have attacked with this weapon, the next attack you make with it deals an extra 1d4 necrotic damage on a hit.

element.name: Onyx Dagger
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: This matte black hilted dagger a small onyx stone at the end of its handle. It seems to be from a civilization long lost.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

Critical hits made with this weapon deal an extra 1d4 necrotic damage. When attacking with this weapon, you can choose to take 1d6 necrotic damage to empower the attack, increasing the critical hit range by 1 when thrown, or by 2 when used in melee combat.

element.name: Onyx Glaive
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: This matte black shafted polearm holds an onyx stone in its shaft. It seems to be from a civilization long lost.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

When you hit with an attack made with this weapon, you can choose to take 1d6 necrotic damage to empower the attack, dealing an extra 1d8 necrotic damage. If the attack kills your target, you get a free attack until the end of your turn, and 15 feet of extra movement towards another creature you are in combat with.

element.name: Onyx Repeater
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: This matte black, metal base crossbow holds an onyx stone. It seems to be from a civilization long lost.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

When you miss with an attack made with this weapon, as a reaction you can choose to take 1d6 necrotic damage and magically reverse the bolt back into the crossbow, allowing you to immediately repeat the attack. You can also choose to take 1d8 necrotic damage to double your proficiency on the new attack, and deal extra necrotic damage equal to the damage you took.

element.name: Onyx Basher
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: This matte black shafted maul hold a fist-sized onyx stone in its head. It seems to be from a civilization long lost.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

When you hit with an attack made with this weapon, you can choose to take 1d6 necrotic damage to empower the attack, dealing an extra 1d8 necrotic damage, and forcing your target to succeed a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, or become stunned until the end of its next turn.

element.name: Onyx Impaler
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: This matte black shafted spear holds an onyx stone in its shaft. It seems to be from a civilization long lost.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

When you hit with an attack made with this weapon, you can choose to take 1d6 necrotic damage to empower the attack, dealing an extra 1d6 necrotic damage, and possibly impaling and lifting the target 5 feet in the air. Make a contested Strength (Athletics) check against the creature's Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check (creature's choice). If you succeed, the creature is lifted in the air. It has disadvantage on attacks, but can try to remove itself from the spear as an action on its turn.

element.name: Onyx Trident
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: This matte black shafted trident holds an onyx stone in its shaft. It seems to be from a civilization long lost.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

When you take the attack action on your turn, you can choose to take 1d4 necrotic damage and forgo an attack to spin the trident in front of yourself and assume a defensive position. All attacks that you can see coming have disadvantage against you, and when an attack misses you, you can use your reaction to perform a counter attack. Make a melee attack with this weapon, on a hit, you deal an extra 1d6 necrotic damage.

element.name: Onyx Thrasher
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: This matte black shafted trident holds an onyx stone in its shaft. It seems to be from a civilization long lost.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities.

When you critically hit a creature with this weapon, you can choose to take 1d6 necrotic damage and empower the attack even further, causing the flail to wildly thrash around, dealing and extra 1d6 bludgeoning and the same amount of necrotic damage to the target.
